The postmaster came in and began obse- quiously to beg his excellency to wait only two 
hours, when, come what might, he would let his excellency have the courier horses. It was plain that he was lying and only wanted to get more money from the traveler. 
"Is this good or bad?" Pierre asked himself. "It is good for me, bad for another traveler, a
